name: The Balance of Nature
description:
Note: you might have to click on the full-screen game to be able to control the menu with your arrow keys.

Rabbits eat carrots that appear each day. Foxes eat rabbits. Every night, the animals try to return to their base. If they have eaten something during the day, they will definitely survive and can reproduce, otherwise they might die.

Using the left and right keys, you can select game parameters and edit them. For instance, you can make the foxes faster.

Try to keep a balance between the rabbit and fox population. Or, just do whatever.

Made for the Mini Jam 34. Themes: balance, two buttons.
